isis.stitle: Recall 03514 Reminder Notice - Air Tank Plumbing on 4200, 4300, and 4400 Family Models Built 8/27/2002 through 7/22/2003 with Side-by-Side Air Tanks, (Feature Code: 504602) at the Escobedo Assembly Plant

recall.subject: Air Tank Plumbing on 4200, 4300, and 4400 Family Models Built 8/27/2002 through 7/22/2003 with Side-by-Side Air Tanks, (Feature Code: 504602) at the Escobedo Assembly Plant

para.exhotlnk: Print ready (PDF file) copy of the dealer letter

defect.para: THIS IS AN ISIS ONLY NOTIFICATION.
There will be NO Dealer Mailing for this RECALL REMINDER.
Please refer to the dealer letter G-03514 for service instructions.

International has decided that the air tank plumbing is not compliant to Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) 121 Section 5.7.1. This campaign includes 4200, 4300, and 4400 family models built 8/27/2002 through 7/22/2003 with side-by-side air tanks (feature code: 504602) at the Escobedo Assembly Plant.

ownernote.para: This letter is to inform you that the owners of suspect vehicles who have not completed the Recall Service Procedure have been sent a reminder to schedule an appointment to have the service performed.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation regarding this campaign and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
